english_measurements.recipient_address: 7th Floor, Interface-07, New Link Road, Malad (W), Mumbai - 400 064
english_measurements.subject: Regarding permission to M/s. Bharti Airtel Ltd. for laying OFC cable in Kalyan division.
english_measurements.work_description: As per the proposal, a demand letter for a surcharge amount of Rs. 36,53,633/- is being issued subject to the terms and conditions of the Municipal Corporation. This is regarding the additional road digging fee for the increased road length.
references: 1) Application from M/s. Bharti Airtel Ltd. dated 18/09/2025.
2) Approval from the Hon. City Engineer dated 01/10/2025.

road_work_measurements.road_name: Vasant Valley Road and internal roads - Open space from D Mart Mohan Square 1 to Motiram Sape Road

english_measurements.title: Terms and Conditions

line_items.description: For laying cable at various locations in the Kalyan division.
Ground rent at Rs. 10 per meter for 20 years

english_measurements.description: Total Surcharge Amount A and B
conditions: For road digging, inform the Police City Traffic Branch, Kalyan, and carry out the work as per their convenience.
For laying OFC cable, do not dig adjacent to the concrete road, but dig on the side of the road, leaving a minimum distance of 1 foot.
Take care to ensure that there is no obstruction to traffic and no accidents occur.

After the road digging work is completed, the excavated soil should be properly filled in the trench and arrangements should be made to lift the remaining soil, so that the road traffic will be smooth.
Before digging the road, contact the concerned department of the said road and start the work according to their consent.

Start the work only after giving prior notice to the Deputy Engineer (Construction Headquarters) before digging the road. After the actual commencement of road digging and OFC cable laying, a weekly report of the started work should be submitted to the Deputy Engineer (Construction Headquarters) with photographs. Also, if the said report is found unsatisfactory, the corporation will have the right to cancel the permission granted to you.
You will be fully responsible for any accident or loss of life while digging the said road.
You will be responsible for the repair or compensation for any damage to water pipelines / electric cables / telephone cables etc. while digging for cable laying.

It will be mandatory to install a board at the actual site showing information about the work, the name of the agency doing the excavation, and the information and telephone number of the engineer of the concerned company.

Necessary safety measures should be taken while carrying out the excavation work. For example, installing safety devices, installing barricades, putting up a nameplate regarding the road excavation, and putting up a nameplate showing the company's name. In this regard, if any complaint is received, it should be resolved immediately, otherwise, please note that punitive action will be taken against you.
After the road digging work is actually completed, a re-survey will be conducted by the Deputy Engineer (Construction Headquarters)...
english_measurements.total_amount_in_words: Thirty-six lakh fifty-three thousand six hundred thirty-three only
english_measurements.copy_to: For information to the Hon. City Engineer, Kalyan Dombivli Municipal Corporation, Kalyan.

table_rows.description: कल्याण विभागातील विविध ठिकाणी केबल टाकणेकरिता.
भुईभाडे १० रु. प्रति मीटर असे २० वर्षाकरिता
सुपरविजन चार्ज खोदाई शुल्कावर १५%
सिक्युरिटी डिपॉझिट खोदाई शुल्कावर १०%

एकूण
कल्याण विभागातील विविध ठिकाणी केबल टाकणेकरिता.
भुईभाडे १० रु. प्रति मीटर असे २० वर्षाकरिता
